item.title: 美联储施密德称政策立场目前仍合适
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰夫-施密德（Jeff Schmid）表示，他赞成暂时按兵不动，以防止强劲的经济活动增加通胀压力。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City President Jeff Schmid said he favors keeping interest rates on hold for the time being to prevent robust economic activity from adding to inflation pressures.】

item.title: 旅游度假公司上调盈利预期，TUI 股价大涨
item.description: TUI AG 大涨 5%，因为这家德国包价假日旅游运营商上调了本财年的业绩指导。【原文：TUI AG surged as much as 5% after the German package-holiday operator raised its guidance for the financial year.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔金称就业与通胀风险之间的平衡尚不明确
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，美国经济走向的不确定性正在降低，但目前仍不清楚央行应将更多精力放在控制通胀还是促进就业市场上。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said uncertainty over the direction of the US economy is decreasing, but it’s still unclear whether the central bank should concentrate more on controlling inflation or bolstering the job market.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州 "光明线 "列车以 15%的速度碾压 9.85 亿美元的债务
item.description: 根据彭博社汇编的数据，连接奥兰多和迈阿密、陷入困境的私营铁路公司 Brightline Florida 正在偿还 9.85 亿美元的债务，收益率为 14.89%，票面利率为 10%。【原文：Brightline Florida — the struggling private rail line connecting Orlando to Miami — is rolling over $985 million of debt with a 14.89% yield and a 10% coupon, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 爱沙尼亚 "数字游民 "项目创下收入纪录
item.description: 据爱沙尼亚政府称，爱沙尼亚一项针对数字游民的计划在今年上半年带来了创纪录的 6800 万欧元（7920 万美元）税收和费用。【原文：An Estonian initiative catering to digital nomads brought in a record €68 million ($79.2 million) in tax revenue and fees in the first half of the year, according to the government.】

item.title: 默克集团利用高等级债券市场为收购 SpringWorks 提供资金
item.description: Merck KGaA 在举行投资者电话会议一天后，于周二进入投资级市场，为其 39 亿美元收购 SpringWorks Therapeutics Inc.【原文：Merck KGaA is in the investment-grade market Tuesday, a day after holding investor calls, to help fund its $3.9 billion acquisition of SpringWorks Therapeutics Inc.】

item.title: 最新通胀数据助推降息预期，美国股市上涨
item.description: 周二，美国股市上涨，因为最新的消费者价格指数报告激起了人们对美联储几乎肯定会在下个月恢复降息的赌注。【原文：US stocks rose on Tuesday after the latest consumer price index report stoked bets that the Federal Reserve is virtually certain to resume cutting interest rates next month.】

item.title: 特朗普削减援助使南非失业率升至一年来新高
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）削减外国援助，导致南非失业率升至一年来的新高，此前社区和社会服务部门的工作岗位流失严重。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s rollback of foreign aid contributed to South Africa’s unemployment rate rising to a one-year high, after the community and social services sector suffered heavy job losses.】

item.title: 以下是美国 7 月份 CPI 报告的主要内容
item.description: 以下是周二公布的 7 月份美国消费者价格指数报告的主要内容：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from the July US consumer price index report, released Tuesday:】

item.title: 中国人减少饮酒，茅台酒业出现多年来最差增长
item.description: 贵州茅台酒股份有限公司（Kweichow Moutai Co.【原文：Kweichow Moutai Co. delivered its worst six-month growth in sales or profit in years as China’s top distiller struggles with weak consumer demand for premium beverages.】

item.title: 特朗普推动和平在高加索地区掀起 "双赢 "债券热潮
item.description: 上周，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的斡旋下，亚美尼亚和阿塞拜疆两国领导人达成了一项和平协议，这激起了人们在经历了数十年的冲突之后重振贸易关系的希望。【原文：Bonds from Armenia and Azerbaijan rallied after a peace agreement brokered by U.S. President Donald Trump last week between the countries’ leaders spurred hopes of revived trade ties after decades of conflict.】

item.title: 马斯克走后，前 a16z 高管为公务员制度打上烙印
item.description: 美国政府人力资源机构的新任主管希望更容易解雇联邦工作人员，取消某些工作的大学学位要求，甚至有可能将养老金引入主权财富基金。【原文：The new director of the US government’s human resources agency wants to make it easier to fire federal workers, drop college degree requirements for certain jobs, and even potentially steer pension money into a sovereign wealth fund.】

item.title: 七月通胀符合预期，美国国债反弹
item.description: 在消费者物价通胀率符合预期后，国债跳涨，交易员对 9 月份降息的预期也随之升温。【原文：Treasuries jumped and traders boosted expectations for a September interest-rate cut after consumer price inflation arrived in line with forecasts.】

item.title: 挪威房屋开工率再次下降，原因是成本和官僚主义的影响
item.description: 在挪威央行转向宽松政策之前，挪威第二季度的房屋开工率扭转了近期的一些涨势，从而加强了进一步降低借贷成本的理由。【原文：Norway’s housing starts reversed some of their recent gains in the second quarter ahead of the central bank’s pivot to easing, strengthening the case for more reductions in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 美国核心 CPI 因服务业而升至 1 月以来最快速度
item.description: 由于服务价格回升，7 月份美国基本通胀率加速上升，达到今年年初以来最强劲的速度。【原文：Underlying US inflation accelerated in July to the strongest pace since the start of the year amid a pickup in services prices.】

item.title: 瑞士通过欧盟对俄罗斯的额外制裁措施
item.description: 瑞士政府在一份声明中表示，继欧盟第 18 个制裁方案之后，瑞士对俄罗斯采取进一步制裁措施。【原文：Switzerland adopts further sanctions against Russia, following the 18th sanctions package of the European Union, the government said in a statement.】

item.title: 印度大亨与美国公司合作开发价值 2 美元的人工智能电子邮件，与 Outlook 竞争
item.description: 印度科技企业家巴文-图拉希亚（Bhavin Turakhia）正在与 GoDaddy 公司合作，在由微软公司和 Alphabet 公司旗下谷歌公司主导的企业市场上，向数千万新用户提供其人工智能主导的电子邮件服务—Titan—。【原文：Indian tech entrepreneur Bhavin Turakhia is partnering GoDaddy Inc. to offer his artificial intelligence-led email service — Titan — to tens of millions of new users in an enterprise market dominated by Microsoft Corp. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google.】

item.title: Venture Global 预计 "近期 "作出首个仲裁裁决
item.description: Venture Global Inc.预计，全球最大的几家能源公司对美国液化天然气出口商提起的第一起仲裁案将 "很快 "结案。【原文：Venture Global Inc. expects the first arbitration case filed by some of the world’s biggest energy companies against the US LNG exporter to be concluded “imminently.”】

item.title: 高利率下巴西通胀低于预期
item.description: 由于巴西央行将利率锁定在可预见的未来的高水平，以降低生活成本的增长，巴西 7 月份的通胀放缓幅度远超预期。【原文：Brazil’s inflation slowed much more than expected in July as the central bank locked interest rates in at sky-high levels for the foreseeable future to bring down cost-of-living increases.】

item.title: 纳格尔称利率处于 "非常好的水平"，欧洲央行可灵活行事
item.description: 理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧元区借贷成本适合持续的贸易逆风，允许欧洲央行在必要时应对进一步的冲击。【原文：Euro-zone borrowing costs are appropriate for the continuing trade headwinds, allowing the European Central Bank to respond to further shocks as needed, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: BNEF 称数据中心需求将加剧铜短缺
item.description: 据 BloombergNEF 报道，数据中心的强劲需求增长预计将加速全球铜市场在本十年后半期出现潜在的供应短缺，到 2035 年，短缺量可能达到 600 万吨。【原文：Robust demand growth from data centers is expected to accelerate a potential supply shortage in the global copper market in the second half of this decade, with the shortfall likely reaching 6 million tons by 2035, according to BloombergNEF.】

item.title: 石油输出国组织（OPEC）认为明年石油需求将加速增长，石油前景将更加紧张
item.description: 欧佩克预测全球石油市场将比之前预计的更加紧张，理由是需求增长加快，竞争对手的供应扩张放缓。【原文：OPEC forecast a tighter global oil market than previously projected, citing accelerating demand growth and a slower expansion in rival supplies.】

item.title: 巴西糖产量创五个月来最长升势
item.description: 纽约原糖期货连续第三天上涨，创下自2月21日以来的最长连涨纪录，原因是市场再次担心巴西这个最大的甘蔗种植国的甘蔗产量下降可能会减少供应。【原文：Raw sugar futures advanced in New York for a third day — the longest winning streak since Feb. 21 — on renewed concerns over weaker cane yields in top grower Brazil that will likely reduce supplies.】

item.title: 电力生产商需要签署大型人工智能协议，以证明股价飙升的合理性
item.description:
寄希望于数据中心推动美国电力需求激增的投资者开始失去耐心。【原文：

Investors counting on a data center-fueled surge in US electricity demand are getting impatient.

】

item.title: 交易员押注英国央行 6 月前减息至 3%，寻求 16 倍回报
item.description: 一位交易员押注英国央行将在明年年中之前降息 100 个基点，比货币市场目前暗示的预期高出一倍多。【原文：A trader has placed a wager on the Bank of England lowering interest rates 100 basis points by the middle of next year, more than double the expectations currently implied by money markets.】

item.title: 乌克兰声称俄罗斯奥伦堡氦气设施遭到无人机袭击
item.description: 在本月对能源基础设施的袭击愈演愈烈之际，乌克兰声称对俄罗斯的一家重要氦气厂进行了袭击。【原文：Ukraine claimed a strike on a key helium plant in Russia amid intensified attacks on energy infrastructure this month.】

item.title: 印度与中国将恢复直飞航班，标志着两国关系更加密切
item.description: 熟悉谈判情况的人士说，印度和中国最快将于下个月恢复直飞航班，因为世界上人口最多的两个国家正在寻求重启两国的政治关系。【原文：India and China are set to resume direct flight connections as soon as next month, people familiar with the negotiations said, as the world’s two most populous countries seek to reset their political ties.】

item.title: 关税惠及消费者，美国通胀率有望上升
item.description: 底特律东方市场的购物者。摄影师：艾米丽-埃尔科宁/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Shoppers at Eastern Market in Detroit. Photographer: Emily Elconin/Bloomberg】

item.title: 恒大股票退市：中国房地产危机的里程碑
item.description: 中国恒大集团表示，其香港股票将退市，这标志着这家昔日高歌猛进的开发商时代的终结。【原文：China Evergrande Group said its Hong Kong stock will be delisted, marking the end of an era for the former high-flying developer whose demise came to symbolize the country’s property bust.】

item.title: 恒大债务高达 450 亿美元，重组无望
item.description: 中国恒大集团的债务负担远比早先估计的要大，高达 3,500 亿港元（450 亿美元），据该开发商的法庭指定清算人称，该中国房地产公司的任何 "整体 "重组都被认为是遥不可及的。【原文：China Evergrande Group’s debt load is far bigger than earlier estimated, amounting to HK$350 billion ($45 billion) as any “holistic” restructuring of the Chinese real estate firm is deemed out of reach, according to the developer’s court-appointed liquidators.】
